label: A_cP1_221_a-001
title: $\alpha$-Po ($A_{h}$, simple cubic) Structure
comments: This is a simple cubic lattice. Polonium is the only element known with this ground state. Originally Po was assigned {\em Strukturbericht} designation \href{current_web_home_dir/A_mC12_5_3c-001}{$A19$}, which is now considered to be incorrect. (Donohue, 1982, 390)
